DNS B-PROT
resource O
record O
type O
(TXT) O
as O
opposed O
to O
solely O
relying O
on O

. O

To O

with O
the O
controller O

to O
using O
existing O
.NET B-FILE
DNS B-PROT
. O

Richard_Johnson.doc B-FILE
: O
878e4e8677e68aba918d930f2cc67fbe B-MD5
0a3f915dd071e862046949885043b3ba61100b946cbc0d84ef7c44d77a50f080 B-SHA2
. O

It O
is O
clear O
that O
the O
text O
is O
a O
base64 B-ENCR

that O

. O

. O

The O
attackers O
rely O
heavily O
on O
Microsoft B-IDTY
technologies O
on O
both O
the O
client O
and O
server O
sides: O
the O
Trojan B-TOOL
uses O
standard O
Windows B-OS
utilities O
like O
Microsoft B-TOOL
Background I-TOOL
Intelligent I-TOOL
Transfer I-TOOL
Service I-TOOL
(BITS B-TOOL
) O
bitsadmin.exe B-FILE
to O
receive O
commands O
and O
exfiltrate O
. O

Remexi B-MAL
developers O
use O
the O
C B-TOOL
programming O
language O
and O
GCC B-TOOL
compiler O
on O
Windows B-OS
in O
the O
MinGW B-TOOL
. O

They O
most O
likely O
used O
the O
Qt B-TOOL
Creator I-TOOL
IDE I-TOOL
in O
a O
Windows B-OS
. O

XOR B-ENCR
and O
RC4 B-ENCR
encryption O
is O
used O
with O
quite O
long O
unique O
keys O
for O
different O
. O

The O
developers O
used O
GCC B-TOOL
compiler O
on O
Windows B-OS
in O
the O
MinGW B-TOOL
. O

Remexi B-MAL
boasts O
features O
that O
allow O
it O
to O
gather O
keystrokes, O
take O
screenshots O
of O
Windows B-OS
of O
interest O
(as O
defined O
in O
its O
configuration), O
steal O
credentials, O
logons O
and O
the O
browser O
history, O
and O
execute O
remote O
. O

Encryption O
consists O
of O
XOR B-ENCR
with O
a O
hardcoded O
key O
for O
its O
configuration O
and O
RC4 B-ENCR
with O
a O
predefined O
password O
for O
encrypting O
the O
victims O
. O

In O
the O
case O
of O
old O
Windows B-OS
versions O
like O
XP B-OS
, O
main O
module O
events.exe B-FILE
runs O
an O
edited O
XPTask.vbs B-FILE
Microsoft B-IDTY
sample O
script O
to O
create O
a O
weekly O
scheduled O
task O
for O
. O

To O
decrypt O
the O
configuration O
data, O
the O
malware B-MAL
uses O
XOR B-ENCR
with O
25-character O
keys O
such O
as O
waEHleblxiQjoxFJQaIMLdHKz O
that O
are O
different O
for O
every O
. O

RC4 B-ENCR
file O
encryption O
relies O
on O
the O
Windows B-OS

CryptoAPI B-TOOL
, O
using O
the O
provided O
values O
MD5 B-ENCR
hash O
as O
an O
initial O
. O

http://108.61.189.174 B-URL
control O
server O
HTTP B-PROT
. O

the O
usual O

encryption O
with O
a O

from O

of O

The O

. O

. O

To O

. O

: O

. O

The O
Svchost B-TOOL
group O
registry O
key O
HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows B-OS
NT\CurrentVersion\SvcHost O
is O
opened O
and O
the O

group O

is O

a O

for O
the O

. O

The O

accomplishes O
this O
through O

group O
value O
data O
located O
in O
the O

group O
registry O
key O
which O
is O
HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows B-OS
NT\CurrentVersion\SvcHost O
. O

On O
a O
Windows B-OS
machine O
, O
the O

group O
contains O
names O
of O
both O
existing O
and O

There O
are O
minor O
differences O
between O
the O

of O
this O
command O
and O
the O
original O
Windows B-OS
one O
. O

It O
registers O

using O

Windows B-OS
API O
function O
. O

The O
ShellMainThreadInt O
function O
gets O
the O
HeapDestroy O
Windows B-OS
API O
address O
and O
replaces O
the O
first O
3 O
bytes O
with O
the O

. O

These O

are O

with O

and O
contains O
a O

of O
remote O
hosts O
where O
to O
connect O
. O

There O
are O
3 O

recognized O

: O
plain O

The O

and O

through O

. O

Ps O
Process O
service O
Unix B-OS
command O
implementation O
. O

SC O
Service O
control O

, O
implemented O
as O
the O
Windows B-OS
one O
. O

TermSvc O
Terminal O
service O
configuration O
( O

Run O
a O
custom O

server O
. O

Run O
TCP B-PROT

v1.0 O
. O

. O

This O

( O

0x88888888 O

The O
Domain B-PROT
Name I-PROT
System I-PROT
( O
DNS B-PROT
) O
is O
the O
phone O
book O
of O
the O
Internet O
. O

In O
the O
same O
way O
that O
people O
program O
named O
contacts O
into O
their O
cell O
phones O
and O
no O
longer O

IP O

. O

When O

can O

. O

Names O
that O
can O

to O

to O

( O

) O

A O

represents O

of O

. O

to O

automatically O

a O

. O
